Wargame: Red Dragon - the first edition of the popular series of strategies in real time , which takes place outside of Europe : this time -scale military conflict is unfolding in Asia between 1975 and 1991 . The game features 17 countries, including five new ones, including China and North Korea . Arsenal added more than 450 kinds of troops and military equipment - their total number now exceeds 1,300. Specifically, Wargame: Red Dragon appeared naval forces and amphibious ATVs , as well as maps with water for their use , that opens up a host of new strategic features. Fans of single player game Wargame: Red Dragon offer campaign on the bloody conflict that erupted around Korea , and those who prefer the multiplayer battles , - the time-tested multiplayer mode with support for up to 20 participants .

Features RePack

1. Do not cut ;
2 . Nothing is converted ;
3 . Checked: for Windows 8.1 (x64);
4 . RePack from R.G. Freedom ( updated 04.27.2014 ) .
